name: Bride's mate forever!
description:
Story

This is the story about a bride's mate on duty!. 

Just get to her friend's wedding as fast as she can. 

No matter what in her way! The flower must be mine!!

Game play

Simple 2D plaformer just make your way to the end of the level. And try to get the flower in the wedding.

Controls

Walk left←Walk right→JumpSpaceExit game ALT+F4(Windows)
CMD+Q(OSX)
